details.title: Pixelate Sr.
details.description: A DSLR photography contest among teams of single individuals, two teams from each school. Topics will be revealed on the spot and participants have to capture a creative photograph, relevant to the topic.      [Eligibility: IX-XII]

details.title: Pixelate Jr.
details.description: A DSLR photography contest among teams of single individuals, two teams from each school. Topics will be revealed on the spot and participants have to capture a creative photograph, relevant to the topic. [Eligibility: VI-VIII]

details.title: Camistic
details.description: A storyboard where participants create a story using pictures and provide a suitable title to it. [Eligibility: IX-XII]

details.title: CreADive
details.description: An Ad-making competition where participants would shoot and edit an advertisement.The time limit is 45-60 seconds. [Eligibility: Open]

details.title: Hi-Res
details.description: TOPIC : Breaking the Fourth Wall with Silence . Create a film with a title and message under 4 minutes, that is creative and relevant to the topic.  [Eligibility: Open]

details.title: Phonescape
details.description: A phone photography contest. Topics will be revealed on the spot and participants have to capture a creative photograph, relevant to the topic.  [Eligibility: XI-XII]
